name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in automation and testing workflows, utilizing tools such as **Playwright** and **Cypress** to ensure high-quality software delivery. My strong background in CI/CD and Gitflow methodologies enables efficient collaboration and streamlined processes within development teams. I am well-versed in integrating AI strategies to enhance testing capabilities, promoting intelligent automation in software quality assurance.

In my previous roles as a Full Stack Developer, I showcased my ability to build high-performance solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors using modern technologies like **JavaScript**/**TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I have led the development of enterprise-grade platforms leveraging frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience with cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS** has equipped me with the skills to implement robust and secure applications that meet compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I am adept at mentorship and collaboration, fostering a productive environment that cultivates growth and knowledge sharing among team members.
